alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 05 at 9:06PM EDT until October 07 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County. .Historic rainfall from Hurricane Ian brought the Little Wekiva River at Altamonte Springs to Major Flood Stage late last week and over the weekend. The river crested at 31.09 ft early Thursday morning and has now fallen to Minor Flood Stage. Minor Flooding is currently forecast through this week. A continual slow decline is forecast into the weekend, with levels possibly falling below Flood Stage by Friday. For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2n. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, Minor flooding near the river in the Altamonte Springs area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday was 29.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2 28.5 28.7 Wed 8 pm 28.4 28.2 MSG MSG MSG &&
